title: How long do bass strings last and will slapping and popping wear the strings down more? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some people like the sound of new strings. These folks will replace them after a couple of months and take great care to wipe them down after each playing session. Others prefer the sound of old strings. Sometimes these players will leave strings on for many years. Really aggressive playing might stretch them more than light playing. You might even break one. But I slap and pop a lot and I’ve never had a problem.
